titleStmt.title: A brief and modest reply to Mr. Penn's tedious, scurrilous and unchristian defence against the Bishop of Cork
titleStmt.author: Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.

notesStmt.note: Edward Wettenhall was Bishop of Cork and Ross between 1679-1699. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
